title: Weekly Willoughby, Richmond Area And Lyndhurst Area Real Estate Market
posting_body: Lyndhurst Vision Fair for seniors event presented by the Cleveland Eye Center occurred on Thursday, 06/16/22 from 9:00 AM to 12:30 PM at 1909 East 101 St. South Euclid Lyndhurst Annual Athletic Golf Scramble event occurred Friday, 06/17/22 from 10:00 AM to 8:00 PM at the St. Denis Golf Course and Party Center.
White Elephant Sale proceeds to Benefit The Lyndhurst Garden Club projects, civic donations and community events affair happened on Saturday, 06/18/22 from 9:00 AM to 4:00 PM.
at 1532 Richmond Rd.
Sunday, 06/19/22 was the Fathers Day.
North Union farmers market at the Legacy Village event occurred on the same day from 10:00AM to 1:00 PM.
Lyndhurst "Safety Town Community Program For Children Entering Kindergarten" event occurred from Monday, 06/20/22 to Thursday, 06/24/22.
City of Richmond Heights Architectural Review Board had a meeting on the same day from 9:30 AM to 10:30 AM.
City of Willoughby Planning Commission had a work session meeting on Tuesday, 06/21/22 from 7:00 PM to 8:00 PM.
Veterans of foreign wars Al Santos And Ladies Auxiliary Post 7536 had a meeting on for Monday, 06/20/22, Tuesday, 06/21/22, on Wednesday, 06/22/22 and on Thursday, 06/23/22 from 7:30 PM to 8:30 PM.
Willoughby Board of Zoning Appeals had a meeting on Wednesday, 06/22/22 from 7:00 PM to 9:00 PM.
Lyndhurst Certified Public Caffe Services Meals meal occurred on Thursday, 06/22/22.
Willoughby Planning Commission had a meeting on the same day from 7:00 PM to 9:00 PM.
There was a high level of activity on the Willoughby, on the Richmond Heights area, on on the Lyndhurst area real estate market this week.
20 single family homes and 2 condominiums were listed for sale.
1 single family home listing was returned to market.
7 single family home listings changed to contract.
The price was reduced for 4 single family homes and for 1 condominium.
The price was raised for 1 single family home.
7 single family home listings and 4 condominium listings began awaiting sale.
Sale pending expired for 1 listing.
17 single family homes and 4 condominium were sold.
1 single family home listing was withdrawn.
1 single family home listing placed temporary off market.
1 single family home listing expired.
